ObjectClass.Name: Landing Probe
ObjectClass.Description: LANDING PROBE: Landing-action remote teleporter beacon Determines where forces can be deployed

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 12 Vision Range: 14

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective

Objective.Name: Remote Transport
Objective.Details: \Teleport an allied unit or building\ to the RTB from anywhere else\ \Dispels cloak

Objective.Name: Release Buffer
Objective.Details: \Release any cargo at location

Objective.Name: Deploy Human Scouts
Objective.Details: Scout Marine - cloaked light infantry \ Assault Marine - anti-ground CQB medic \ Automech - tanky AA detector \ Marauder ATHC - agile, cloaking light-tank \ Lancer - ultralight fighter-bomber

Objective.Name: Deploy Grekim Scouts
Objective.Details: Octo - agile melee infantry \ Sepi - cloaking support sniper \ Pharo - tanky detector grenadier \ Octopod - tank buster \ Sepipod - air superiority fighter

Objective.Name: Deploy Vecgir Scouts
Objective.Details: Zayin Tercher, Teth Pulser \ Not implemented yet

Objective.Name: Deploy Random Scouts
Objective.Details: \Randomly select a scout group

Objective.Name: Human
Objective.Details: Play as the Humans:\Versatile masters of offense\Favor highly efficient, flexible ground forces\ \Easy to learn for new players

Objective.Name: Grekim
Objective.Details: Play as the Grekim:\Devious masters of timetravel\Rely on self-chronoportation and air power\ \For Echo Ops veterans only

Objective.Name: Vecgir
Objective.Details: Play as the Vecgir:\Insular masters of teleportation\Exploit hypermobile self-teleporting vehicles\Powerful defensive structures and abilities\Intermediate difficulty for new players

Objective.Name: Random
Objective.Details: \Randomly select a species to deploy

Objective.Name: Change Team
Objective.Details: \Change allegiance: \ Join the target ally-unit's team

Objective.Name: Interdiction
Objective.Details: \Eliminate this asset

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: spawns scout marines for AI player

Objective.Name: Deploy Lancer
Objective.Details: \Multi-role light fighter-bomber \Attacks ground and air targets \Produces Caltrop Mines

Objective.Name: Deploy AutoMech
Objective.Details: Durable AA support walker \Strong against airborne enemies \Inaccurate vs moving ground targets \Detects cloaked units \Machinery-Tech increases durability

Objective.Name: Deploy Marauder ATFV
Objective.Details: \Agile cloaking all-terrain light tank \Decloaks to fight; Can't hit flying targets \Specials-Tech enables Combat Overcharge \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Deploy 2 Support-Marines
Objective.Details: \Light skirmisher combat-technicians \Repair damaged units and structures \Cloak while stationary \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Deploy Assault-Marine
Objective.Details: \Close combat heavy-infantry \Upgradeable to cloak during combat \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: spawns octos and sepis for AI player

Objective.Name: Produce Octo
Objective.Details: Resilient melee assault trooper\Good at absorbing enemy fire\Cannot attack air targets\Morphs into RP or Dome\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Squiddy/Sepi
Objective.Details: Cloaking support sharpshooter\Low HP, high DPS vs ground and air\Cloaks while moving or idle\Morphs into Mound or Reaph\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Pharo
Objective.Details: Heavily armored shock grenadier\Detects cloaked enemies\Only effective vs light ground targets\Morphs into Spyre or Arcticus\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Produce Octopod
Objective.Details: \Biological main ground-assault armor\Mobile, high impact AG-only sniper\Low HP and combat endurance

Objective.Name: Produce Humboldt/Sepipod
Objective.Details: \Biological air superiority fighter-bomber\Good scout and raider\Detects cloaked enemies\Limited combat endurance
